Reviews.Title: "I really wish there were a way to ignore EVERYONE!"
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: The Nokia C6 is the PERFECT for for you if you're looking for a legitimate excuse to never have to answer your phone!Features include:* Tactile slide-out keyboard.* Ringer volume ranges from "Dog Whistle" to "What is this, an auditorium for ants?"* Vibration device that I can only assume functions by lightly rubbing sandpaper across the inside of the phone, ensuring you will hear it long before you feel it.* Lethargic Receptionist(tm) technology will alert you of missed calls and new messages by beeping or vibrating a single time and never again. Lethargic Receptionist(tm) technology can not be deactivated.* Ninja Stealth Energy Conservation(tm) system will never warn you when your battery is low and, instead, randomly shut your phone off. To re-activate your phone, you must plug it into a power source and hold down the power button for 12.4 seconds. Ninja Stealth Energy Conservation(tm) system can not be deactivated.* Zero support for Mac OS. But hey, no one uses Macs anyway these days.* Ovi App Store, because you were too cheap to get an Android or iPhone.* Tactile slide-out keyboard.
